Blog.post: ha!z.. todae waste lots of time in class cuz lookin for classes den will lend us deir ohp...search for so long n finalli 1/8 lend us deirs....den after schl heard tt cher is gg to spotcheck for books left underneath our desk n everyone was so kanjiong in tryin to hide it....but our class onli left files so we nt scare lo.. but of all ting... her class books kena confiscated despite de fact dey tried to hide it...ha!z... den durin band.. she gt gastric n she refuses to eat so mi go tell her her band 'captain' n she was force to it or else she will b forbided to play her instrument.. den eventualli she go eat lo...heng men or else she gt gastric veri terrible de.. den mi wait for her band finish while seein de ndp rehearsal..... den luckili she gt her books back.. YEA...den dunnoe y she was allowed to leave de band earli... mi den follow her out of de schl gate n juz nice when she go out of de schl gate de bus came lo ha!z n cuz of tt didnt get much time to tok with her...

mi in schl was almost slpin all de time cuz abit sick.. den luckily durin common test nt tt bad... den still can do... hope mi pass... den durin peer tutorin saw her outside my class... eventualli mi will go out to tok to her lo...after peer tutorin go find her but cant... i tink she went home liao...ha!z den nw sick again but smsin with her make mi feel beta nw.... den i finalli ask her de q but she sae she will tell mi her ans another de.. ha!z mi hope it will b yes but i knoe its definiteli no de......

ha!z... todae nth happen much in schl xcept tt i wasnt felin well when schl was nearli over... den after schl while waitin for wei quan... mi tok to her lo... den after gg to tm with weiquan...go home feel so sicky.... veri surprised when she called mi lata in de evenin.... tok tok tok with her was SO NICE.... but as usual.. mum was angry with mi for tokin so long on de fone n thus confiscate de hse fone... could u believe it its juz a hse fone... but mi nvr regret it as was happi to tok with her for so long on de fone..

ha!z... todae didnt realli happen much until badminton.. men badminton do rox but with mr quek... its opposite...den after badminton.. go eat lunch lo... n i stinks big time... men...den after eatin lunch go com lab.. didnt do much dere.. den when abt to go home saw 'her' but didnt tok much too HA!Z.... den go home my fren call mi go watch movie irobot... quite nice show..... didnt regret watchin it...den go buy cd... ha!Z tt all baz...

asual mi go use com sure will alwaes b depressed de.. ha!z...mornin waited for abt 15 min at de piano juz to lend weenin my racket but mi waited n waited but she did nt appear....den mi juz went to assemble at de parade ground lo..... durin dnt i took de nails i found n use it to cut mi wrist so as to leave de scar.... todae for sci cuz of cant line up properli we hav to walk around de parade grounds in two n we look idiotic doin tt despite mani ppl enjoyin it as we wasted time n do not hav to studi.... gt back my sci common test paper.. nt realli satisfied with de marks i get but i cant ask for more cuz i do nt deserve it.... eng period was nuts men we receive so mani book reviews worksheet n writin our name alone on each ws is killin us n imagine writin reviews of books on each ws....den for assembli we had chi opera tingy... it was kinda lame n mani didnt enjoy de programme.. after assembli.. mi go back class n get my bag liao den straight away go to crest haven to wait for 'her' fren to come out of de crest haven for councilin...ha!z....

ha!z mi juz came back from badminton trainin...change my rackets grip... tml still hav to lend a sumone... ha!z mi still hav to do histori mindmap.. planin to do lata on... HA!z.....nth to write le.... didnt eat dinner planin to jian fei.. lose weight i mean....ha!z tt all ba....n my fren saed tt i m obsessed with de gal tt i lyk... izzit true?? mi still wonderin....
Ha!Z dis morn wake up straight away go online.... dunnoe y everytime go online feel so depressed....Ha!z 'she' nw havin her band... hope she enjoy her band....

mi alwaes tt suey...todae gt nature call juz when i was abt to leave for schl.. eventualli late... still gt detention after schl plus nw everydae muz report schl by 7.05...den sci period.. cher didnt com.. yenchin go spray mi water den mi spray de whole bottle at her lo make her so wet...den throw magnet still kana amelia... den of course sure tio her fist lo....den after schl still kana chin hian prayin mantis skill... sumore almost make mi pissed off with him... men hes nuts...HA!z.....den todae didnt realli much tok to her even though saw her haiz... dunnoe y...ha!z mi nw gg to cut my hand....learn from her de... i tink tt all abt it ba...mi nw veri depressed.. so didnt realli wanna write much ha!z....

Haiz.. mi todae gt caught by mizz junainah for carvin sumth on my hand... luckili she told mi juz to wash it away... no nd go counsellin unlyk 'her'.. Todae mi lied to cher sae mi gg toilet but actualli go to crest haven to c her cuz she nd go dere for counsellin..... Ha!z... nw no more racial harmoni rehearsal... cant realli c her tt often animore....:( after schl actualli hav peer tutorin but den soon after i saw her b4 de peer tutorin lesson.... mi didnt go to peer tutorin instead tok with her while waitin for her other fren hu was in de crest haven for counsellin.....

hihi... haiz wad a dae....mi perform for racial harmoni todae.. classmates n frens still can recognise mi despite mi wearin a mask n cloth over mi bodi.... MOST IMPORTANTLI... 'she' gt punished by miss Junainah n mrs Stella tan.... haiz she almost cried n i was dere wasnt able to do aniting.....:( felt so useless n mi heart kinda break when i saw her being scolded....wad to do.... onli hav mi to blameHA!Z>>> i tink tt it ba...

ha!Z sux men past two daes...com spoil den cant chat with her on msn n cannt update my blog....tts y past 2 daes no blog bein updated... den my hp line terminated n change to hi card...ha!Z....todae went to whitesand with fren to buy transparency n marker for de art tingy den went home to do art.... ha!z den mi still waitin for her to call mi... ha!Z mayb she buzy lo... ha!z....

yoz... todae morn wake up watch tv while waitin for mum to com back with breakfast... eat liao den do homewk...do n do n do... den late afternoon my mum went out.. tt was when mi start to use de com n saw her onlie yea... so happi... chat ah chat ah chat.. den she gtg le ha!Z too bad...den went to century square to eat dinner.. com back watch tv n sms with her so happi.. den her hp no bat so cant sms with her le... den decide to use de com...too bad she nt online... tink she went to slp le...ha!z...

wah todae morn break new record reach schl at 6.40 den actualli wanted to wait for her to reach schl... but in the end dun dare cuz feel paiseh cuz she comin with her frens....den de national dae performance nt bad lah.. kinda enjoy it...after de performance can go home le but mi decided to stay back to wait for her.... but de band members all sae she went home le... den mi lyk veri sad but abit dun believe cuz mi didnt c her go out de gate... so i still waited n den i saw her....i knew it she did nt go home yet...den she went to play badminton near her frens hse.. so mi waited for her lo.. wait until abt 1 plus lo... tt was when she decided to go home...den mi go home sms with her... my frens ask mi go play badminton with dem... we played 4 a hr den go gym... lolx mi todae first time go gym.. feel so shiok after workin out...den go home skip dinner cuz mi wanna jian fei...yea den lata still wanna call her....

yoz...todae recess again didnt much tok to her.. den common test quite hard cuz i hate summary...after schl again didnt much tok to her but mi still waited for her to finish her band... den while walkin out of de schl ha!Z mi didnt tok to her much n when waitin for bus too didnt tok much.... den evenin use msn so happi.. managed to chat with her...n tml decide to break my record abt de time reachin schl... lolx... hope i can do it... i will try to suceed for her sake....

wah todae durin music lessons hav to sing de national dae song cool men....den science lessons mi so suey men.. of all ting muz raise my voice so loud den teacher heard mi n scold mi...men so suey...ha!z recess time didnt much tok to her....eng lessons gg thru de summary tt time wah mi slpin men den oso gt cut myself...pc we suppose to write sumth tt make us sad n happi but mi onli hav few tings tt make mi sad n nth make mi happi so mi didnt rewalli wanna write cuz dun want teacher to knoe wad make mi sad...ha!z after schl saw her again didnt much tok to her.. den while mi waitin for her peer tutorin...mi wen to c my 'mama' n 'papa' n dey wanna knoe hu i lyk but mi didnt tell dem... mi so bad so unfillial.... ha!z when she finish her peer tutorin mi go to bus stop with her oso didnt much tok with her.. ha!z den bus came so fast... ha!z... yea den at home so gd... mi called her n tok to her for so long..... mi so HAPPI!!!

todae morn in schl after singin national nathem we had to rehearse our position for de national dae tingy... cuz of tt we mizz half of pe session...plus todae so mani teachers didnt com for our lessons n of course class will b chaotic lo...ha!z den badminton shiok lo.. manage to lose some weight.. after badminton... we ate with mr quek n tinkin tt we might want to hav our own jearsey.... finalli men tts so cool... ha!z....den after eatin waited for her to finish her band until 5 plus but yet when she came out of her band room mi didnt get to tok to her...:(ha!z....

ha!z todae history bcom a lame judge.... dnt was alwaes lyk feacies especialli with teacher lyk mr yeo kana stay back durin recess for a while...math n sci wasted so much time men... cuz math sumone sabtouch the ohp den teacher angry lo for sci is cuz again we came down to de sci lab late....de assembli kinda lame lo didnt much enjoy it....after schl didnt do much ting lo.. waited for 'her' to go home first den went home...ha!z...

ha!z todae wake up no one at home.. den go watch tv lo... watch watch watch mum n bro com bac den cannt watch lo... den go eat de lunch tt they brought bacj.. after eatin mi perepare my stuff to get ready for my badminton pract... finish badminton pract liao den mum bring to temple wait for de shifu until 9 plus he still didnt com out... den mi mum n mi go home lo....ha!z once again didnt realli tok with 'her'..... ha!z,....

todae stay home whole dae didnt realli do aniting much...whole afternoon wait for her to sms mi cuz mi dun dare to make e '1st' move but she didnt sms mi:( ha!z... den after evenin go online n wait for her to go online de whole nitex ha!z but again she didnt go online:( ha!z....den dae by dae mi still wait for her ans but even though i knoe is sure no but mi will still wait no matter hw long...ha!z..:(
